metadata.title: Enrichment IP - Forcepoint
metadata.description: This playbook checks if malicious IP address is blocked or unblocked by SMC firewall.
mainSteps: 1. Fetches a list of potentially malicious IP addresses
2. Enrich the incident with IP status information.
prerequisites: 1. Forcepoint SMC Custom Connector needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same resource group.
2. Forcepoint SMC API Key should be known.[Refer here](http://www.websense.com/content/support/library/ngfw/v610/rfrnce/ngfw_6100_ug_smc-api_a_en-us.pdf )
3. Forcepoint SMC Version number should be known. [Refer here](https://help.stonesoft.com/onlinehelp/StoneGate/SMC/)
